title: jaycsantos.com v4 (self)
description: V4 of personal website. Best viewed in dark mode.

title: "White Label App" / StudentSquad
description: Spearheaded the development of a full-stack mobile/web application for collaboration and publishing, enabling real-time and offline functionality for a white-label solution.
Co-designed the database schema and rewrote the Firestore security rules, significantly reducing code to under 150 lines while maintaining robust and secure access control.
Designed reusable components with minimal boilerplate and interface complexity, enabling junior developers to efficiently integrate new features.
Optimized Flutter web performance by developing direct integrations with web libraries.

title: "Photo Sharing App" (unpublished)
description: Led the full-stack mobile/web development mobile app with separate web interface. Features real-time photo sync and reverse geolocation capabilities.
Developed an initial solution for automatically grouping photos based on specific time and location before exploring AI-powered approaches.

title: "Inventory App" (unpublished)
description: Led the research and development of an inventory mobile app with offline and real-time synchronization capabilities.
Collaborated closely with UX designers to significantly enhance UX in asset management by streamlining the workflow.

title: MyCoach/GradGuru Console v3
description: Rebranded and redesigned the console web app using Material UI and ensuring compliance with WCAG AA. Secured authentication with Okta MFA.
Redesigned user experience with key features such as faster list filtering, infinite scrolling, scroll state retention, drag-and-drop, and efficient batch processing, parsing, and validation of data.

title: MyCoach/GradGuru Mobile App
description: Fast-tracked mobile app development to achieve WCAG AA compliance.

title: MyCoach/GradGuru Chat
description: Rebrand and maintainance of web chat interface for MyCoach, keeping UX consistency with the other apps.
Secured with okta MFA and compliance with WCAG AA accessibility standards.

title: GradGuru Console v2
description: Continued the migration of the web console from PHP to Angular, concurrently adding new features and integrations.
Developed an interactive flowchart editor that enables users to design chatbot flows that can be simulated and tested.

title: GradGuru Chat
description: Forked riot.im as matrix client and customized it to be a chat interface for GradGuru.
Added and maintained new features, custom message types and API integrations.

title: GoLearn (freelance consultant)
description: Consulted on the development of a web app for a learning platform, providing guidance on the architecture, design, and implementation of the app's features and functionalities.
Documented MVP requirements, timeline estimates, technical specifications, and best practices.

title: The H Hub (freelance)
description: Commision work to add new features, functions and integrate new api end points.

title: Omnifi-Modeler
description: A web-based visual model editor for state machine flows enabling real-time collaboration among multiple users.
Developed interactive features such as drag-and-drop, connection constraints and inline editing, and implemented data parsing functionality from/to the data model.

title: Pumba
description: Developed an internal web tool that leverages the Redmine REST API to query ticket data and generate dynamic data tables and visually compelling trend graphs. This tool empowered the QA team to effectively analyze their performance and identify areas for improvement.

title: Web Soundboard
description: A soundboard PWA. Used in a holiday live presentation that needed on-the-fly sound effects and background music.
https://github.com/jaycsantos/mario-soundboard

title: Prudle
description: Developed an internal web tool that effectively parses possible grammars from GRXML/VGSL value sets. This tool significantly assisted the QA team in their evaluation and testing of generated grammar models.

title: 24HourAsnwers (freelance)
description: Successfully co-developed a mobile application using the PhoneGap/Cordova framework, empowering users to seamlessly manage tutoring requests, schedule sessions, and facilitate secure online payments.

title: "Chat Upgrade" Demo
description: Made a demo page for a sales presentation that shows an upgraded chat feature that allows users to have interactions on a embeded product.

title: ScoutJS
description: Brainchild full stack project: an internal telemetry service that enables capturing front-end logs & able to notify & display history, trends, pattern flow, errors & data object parsing.
Did project proposal, documentation and presentation across department executives.

title: Flowmulate
description: [Best Thesis, IT 2015] An innovative web application for flowchart algorithm design, simulation, and code translations, designed to facilitate effective learning for programming students.

This project empowered users to design logic blocks through an intuitive flowchart interface, execute and simulate their designs, generate code in various programming languages, and even automate the scoring of examinations, providing a valuable learning tool for students.

title: Generic Service Mgmt System
description: A general use management system for most kinds of service provider.

title: Tic Tac Toe vs Bot
description: A small tic tac toe game project using Java which can be played against the computer. Project for java programming class.

title: Putt More Base

Implemented a realistic physics engine using Box2D.
Features include leaderboards, shareable solutions, and user-created levels from level editor.
